Name: Saving Simon
About the game: Saving Simon our first project and first game about ''Simon Riley''. Simon Riley has some puberty problems.He doesn't trust anyone because of family problems. He's trying to escape his problems.He sees suicide as an option. This game made with RPG Maker.But there isn't any enemy or any action. When playing, -You will make some choices.This choices're very important for ''Saving'' Simon. -Simon will tell his story slowly. -There are a few puzzle maps in this game.
